name: And There Was Only One Gun
name_original: And There Was Only One Gun
description:
This is a simple game made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021. It's a two lane arcade shooter, but only one ship can fire at a time. Play it with a controller and experience the raw joy of controlling two ships at the same time! The ideal experience is to grab a friend and have them hold one side of the controller while you hold the other. You share a gun and a controller.

This game was implemented in the Bevy game engine for Rust.
